getAdvertisingIdInfo(android.content.Con.Description: Retrieves the user's advertising ID and limit ad tracking preference. This method cannot be called in the main thread as it may block leading to ANRs. An IllegalStateException will be thrown if this is called on the main thread.

ClassDesc: Helper library for retrieval of advertising ID and related information such as the limit ad tracking setting. It is intended that the advertising ID completely replace existing usage of other identifiers for ads purposes (such as use of ANDROID_ID in @B_android#provider#Settings#Secure_E@) when Google Play Services is available. Cases where Google Play Services is unavailable are indicated by a @B_com#google#android#gms#common#GooglePlayServicesNotAvailableException_E@ being thrown by getAdvertisingIdInfo().
